[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@microsoft/rush-lib](./rush-lib.md) &gt; [CobuildConfiguration](./rush-lib.cobuildconfiguration.md) &gt; [cobuildRunnerId](./rush-lib.cobuildconfiguration.cobuildrunnerid.md)

## CobuildConfiguration.cobuildRunnerId property

> This API is provided as a beta preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

This is a name of the participating cobuild runner. It can be specified by the environment variable RUSH\_COBUILD\_RUNNER\_ID. If it is not provided, a random id will be generated to identify the runner.

**Signature:**

```typescript
readonly cobuildRunnerId: string;
```
